pageContext.claim: “Republicans had a deal until Nancy Pelosi rode into town from her extended vacation. The Democrats want the Virus to win? They are asking for things that have nothing to do with our great workers or companies. They want Open Borders & Green New Deal. Republicans shouldn’t agree!”
pageContext.analysis: Democrats held up the stimulus package over concerns the draft measure did not do enough to protect workers and too few ways to confirm that federal money would not be abused by businesses. Four days later Trump signed an amended version of the bill.
